this game makes me want to kill my self every day. would recommend.

Most of the time its a great FPS game. But, the lower ranks are hard to climb out of due to smurfs and questionably lucky players (walls/aim lock). VAC doesn't detect cheaters at all it seems. I've been disconnected from competitive games by hackers without them getting any penalty. Also, the rank system can feel unsatisfying, with your actual progress to the next rank left ambiguous. Outside of competitive mm the game has a great casual community. Whether it be in War Games servers or in the community server browser, you're bound to find a fun group of people. 8/10

This is the best fps game I have ever played, just because of the guns, the modes, how the game works, it is just  amazing and it's nice to chat with your team. This game really really need co operations, I do recommend playing this game.

i flash my friends on purpose

Normal CS:GO is lame, but Chinese CS:GO is a great game. Fun stuff. Prophunt (which is called Peekaboo by Chinese hosts) is the best gamemode on here. Everything else is just not all that good. I like playing Prophunt on Chinese servers and talking in VC, because Chinese people think Americans are great (Hint: We're the best). Outrageously enough, CS:GO Prophunt is not available on Western servers at all and I have literally never seen prophunt on the in-game server browser.

P.S. Chinese people don't know English so all the prophunt maps have the prefix "prophurt_", which I find funny.
